titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Rocky Mountain Fuel Company Maps and Materials, circa 1910-1976
Rocky Mountain Fuel Company Maps and Materials

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by D. Claudia Thompson July 2015

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Rocky Mountain Fuel Company maps and materials

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

did.abstract: Maps and other materials of a land-holding company engaged in coal, oil, and gas extraction in Colorado.

bioghist.head: History of the Rocky Mountain Fuel Company
bioghist.p: The Rocky Mountain Fuel Company was a land-holding company incorporated in 1910 under the laws of Wyoming. The company owned land which was leased for coal, oil, and gas development in Boulder, Fremont, Garfield, Grand, Gunnison, Huerfano, Las Animas, Park, Routt, and Weld Counties in Colorado. The company also leased its land for agriculture and timbering. Although the company filed for bankruptcy and was ordered to be liquidated in 1946, it was still in liquidation in 1973, when Gerald R. Armstrong took over the presidency.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Rocky Mountain Fuel Company collection contains maps and blueprints of mines in Colorado. Also included are a set of index cards describing the maps. In addition there are mine profiles, drill logs from properties in Oklahoma, bonds, annual reports from the 1970s, and press clippings about the Rocky Mountain Fuel Company and Gerald R. Armstrong.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on the materials for research purposes, and the collection is open to the public.

userestrict.head: Copyright Information
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for observing all copyright, property, and libel laws as they apply.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Other materials created by the Rocky Mountain Fuel Company are located at the Denver Public Library, Denver, Colorado.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This material was received from Gerald R. Armstrong, 1975-1977.
